name: Sapling Tower
description:
Sapling Tower

Made in 48 hours during the Kenny Jam 2022,  All assests provided by Kenny

Source Code

Climb the spiraling sapling tower, overcoming any of the obstacles that grow before you. What awaits you at the summit?

Controls:

Use A/D to move along the platform, holding shift will allow you to run and accumlate speed. 

Pressinh W/Space will make you jump and holding down will let you slide under platforms.

Cut Content:

I overscoped by a large margin, so heres a list of cut content that I had hoped to get in. Guess I never learn haha... sigh

  • Wall Jumping
  • Vine Boost
  • Ice Blocks (Ice Biome)
  • Enemies
  • More Obstacles
  • More Vertical Platforming
  • Audio :D
